episodes.title: That Time Sara Joined a Cult (JMS)
episodes.description: Join Sara and Sydney this week as Sara reveals it all for the first time about her experience with a cult while she studied abroad in Japan from 2016-2017. JMS, also known as Providence and many other names, is a cult founded by Jung Myung-seok in 1980 and headquartered in Wol Myeong-dong, South Korea. Sources for this episode: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Providence_(religious_movement) In the Name of God: A Holy Betrayal (2023) docuseries on Netflix https://www.allkpop.com/buzz/2023/03/the-locations-of-the-infamous-jms-branch-churches-are-being-exposed-online Have a topic idea for us to do in future episodes? Email us at letsbebriefed@gmail.com Like our content?
